tripleplay.ui
Interface Interface.Task

Enclosing class:
Interface
public static interface Interface.Task

A time based task that requires an update per frame. See Interface.addTask(tripleplay.ui.Interface.Task).

Method Summary
 void update(int delta)
          Performs the update for this task.
 

Method Detail

update

void update(int delta)
Performs the update for this task.

Parameters:
delta - time that has passed (in ms), normally passed down from Game.Default.update(int).
